entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023
